name: Root Rush
description:
Root Rush

  • Space / A to join, Enter / Start to start match
  • WASD / Left stick to steer, Space / A to spread

Make your roots grow all over the place in this fast-paced multiplayer game! Collect valuable nutrients and cut off the other players in order to grow the biggest and most beautiful plant.

For up to 4 Players (Controllers required)
